resources.string: There was a problem with the network connection.\nAre you sure you\'re connected to the internet?
There was an error with your email; please check that you entered it correctly.
Please enter a password that is at least 6 characters long.
Notifications bothering you or taking a break.Simply disable all the tools and enable them again to dive into the world of lucid dreaming.
Being aware of your surrounding is the key in lucid dreaming.Get notified to do reality checks.
Notifications will prompt u to do Reality Checks. Control them here.
Wake up in the morning and your dream journal will simply be a tap away. Dream journaling is the perfect way to start your day.
Read your nightly adventures everyday before sleeping. Incubate any of your previous dreams to increase the chance of lucidity in your dreams.
Sorry! Your device doesn\'t support speech input

LucidMe is an app where you can store your dreams,view and edit them on multiple devices.The main objective of the app is to help you in your journey of lucid Dreaming.It hopes to give you an extra push into the rabbit hole of Lucid Dreaming.
Love the app? Show us your appreciation by rating, sharing the app and by providing us your valuable suggestions and comments
Explore the world of Lucid dreaming.Read various articles and faqs all related to lucid dreaming.Here we present you some websites to help gain you more insight in lucid dreaming.
